trans-unit.source: The DirectoryEntry class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DirectoryEntry encapsula um nó ou o objeto na hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta classe para o enlace para objetos, ou ler e atualizar atributos.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryEntry, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryEntry, juntamente com classes de programa auxiliar, fornece suporte para ciclo de vida de gestão e navegação métodos.

trans-unit.source: These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children.
trans-unit.target: Estes incluem a criar, eliminar, mudar o nome, mover um nó subordinado e a enumerar os elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar um nó, deve consolidar as alterações serem guardados para a árvore.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: DirectoryEntry can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryEntry pode ser utilizado para aceder a entradas regulares e algumas, mas nem todas as informações de entradas de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes.
trans-unit.target: A hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory contém até vários milhares nós.

trans-unit.source: Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Cada nó representa um objeto, tal como uma impressora de rede ou um utilizador num domínio.

trans-unit.source: Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added.
trans-unit.target: Redes empresariais constantemente alterar como novos funcionários recrutados e objetos, tais como computadores e impressoras de rede são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree.
trans-unit.target: A tecnologia de Interfaces de serviço de diretório (ADSI) Active Directory fornece formas de adicionar programaticamente estes objetos para a árvore de diretórios.

trans-unit.source: To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma entrada de diretório na hierarquia, utilize o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property is a collection that provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>propriedade é uma coleção que fornece um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>método, através do qual adicionar um nó para a coleção diretamente abaixo do nó principal que atualmente estão vinculados aos.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um nó para a coleção, tem de especificar um nome para o novo nó e o nome de um modelo de esquema que pretende associar o nó.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode querer utilizar um esquema intitulado "Computador" para adicionar novos computadores na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe também contém atributo colocação em cache, que pode ser útil para otimizar o tráfego de rede.

trans-unit.source: To use attribute caching, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar o atributo colocação em cache, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The classes associated with the DirectoryEntry component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers.
trans-unit.target: As classes associadas com o componente de DirectoryEntry podem ser utilizadas com nenhum dos fornecedores de serviço de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT.
trans-unit.target: Alguns dos fornecedores atuais são serviços de informação Internet (IIS), acesso protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory), serviço de diretório de NetWare do Novell (NDS) e WinNT.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Presume-se que tem uma compreensão geral dos serviços de domínio do Active Directory antes de utilizar esta classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>Descrição geral do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class that binds to the specified native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe que está vinculado ao objeto de serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor permite utilizar os métodos e propriedades de um programa a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe num objeto de serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo que implementa a interface IADs através de uma API nativa.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a interface IADs, consulte o tópico [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) na biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The name of the native Active Directory Domain Services object to bind to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo à qual vincular.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class that binds this instance to the node in Active Directory Domain Services located at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe que está vinculado esta instância para o nó do Active Directory Domain Services localizado no caminho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The path at which to bind the DirectoryEntry to the directory.
trans-unit.target: O caminho no qual se vincular a DirectoryEntry para o diretório.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O caminho deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: O nome de utilizador a utilizar durante a autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe para utilizar na autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O caminho deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: O nome de utilizador a utilizar durante a autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe para utilizar na autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*>propriedade é inicializada para este valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of authentication to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de autenticação a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: Prior to [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.
trans-unit.target: Anteriores ao [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], o valor predefinido é <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.
trans-unit.target: Começando com [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], o valor predefinido é <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o subordinado entradas deste nó da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The child entries are only the immediate children of this node.
trans-unit.target: As entradas de subordinados são os subordinados imediatos deste nó.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para localizar, obter ou criar uma entrada de diretório na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é uma coleção que, juntamente com as capacidades de iteração habitual, fornece uma <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>método através do qual adicionar um nó para a coleção diretamente abaixo do nó principal que atualmente estão vinculados aos.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um nó para a coleção, tem de especificar um nome para o novo nó e o nome de um modelo de esquema que pretende associar o nó.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode querer utilizar um esquema intitulado "Computador" para adicionar novos computadores na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, changes are made locally to a cache.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Por predefinição, as alterações são feitas localmente uma cache.

trans-unit.source: After you modify or add a node, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar ou adicionar um nó, tem de chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>método para consolidar as alterações serem guardados para a árvore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>antes de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para a cache de propriedade serão perdidas.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> methods, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>métodos e o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries"></xref> object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries"> </xref> objeto que contém as entradas de subordinado deste nó da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto e liberta os recursos do sistema que estão associados este componente.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método para libertar recursos do sistema não geridos, sem aguardar a recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Following a call to Close, any operations on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> might raise exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Após uma chamada de Close, quaisquer operações <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>poderá aumentar as exceções.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Guarda as alterações efetuadas para uma entrada de diretório para o repositório subjacente do diretório.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, são feitas alterações às propriedades localmente para uma cache e valores de propriedade para ser de leitura são colocadas em cache após o primeiro de leitura.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> (if this is the newly created entry).
trans-unit.target: As alterações efetuadas à cache incluem alterações às propriedades, bem como as chamadas para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>(se esta entrada recém-criada).</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling CommitChanges, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>antes de chamar CommitChanges, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para a cache de propriedade serão perdidas.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Security - Use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Segurança – utilize o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>classe para ler, escrever, eliminar, alterar e adicionar à hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.
trans-unit.target: Associado a enumeração: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia desta entrada como elemento subordinado do principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>é `true`, chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>no novo objeto de fazer a cópia permanente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support the CopyTo method.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de acesso protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) não suporta atualmente o método CopyTo.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: O nome único do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que será o principal para a cópia que está a ser criada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the copy of this entry as a child of the new parent.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que representa a cópia desta entrada como elemento subordinado do principal nova.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> não é um contentor.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object, as a child of the specified parent <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object, with the specified new name.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto, como elemento subordinado do principal especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto, com o novo nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support this method.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de acesso protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) não suporta este método.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>é `true`, chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>no novo objeto de fazer a cópia permanente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DN of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: DN do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que será o principal para a cópia que está a ser criada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the copy of this entry.
trans-unit.target: O nome da cópia desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: A renamed copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia cujo nome foi alterada desta entrada como elemento subordinado do principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> o objeto não é um contentor.

trans-unit.source: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elimina esta entrada e a respetiva subárvore completa da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de fornecido pelo sistema de Interfaces de serviço do Active Directory (ADSI), apenas o acesso protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) suporta atualmente esta operação.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > A entrada e a respetiva subárvore completa são eliminados da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Security - Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Segurança – utilize <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>para eliminar as entradas da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Associado a enumeração: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> não é um contentor.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes recursos (que não seja memória) que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>Invoca o método de Dispose protegido com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A></xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões todos os recursos que são detidos por quaisquer objetos geridos que este <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>referências de objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>método de cada objeto referenciado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>métodos, consulte [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified path represents an actual entry in the directory service.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o caminho especificado representa uma entrada no serviço de diretório real.

trans-unit.source: The path of the entry to verify.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de entrada para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified path represents a valid entry in the directory service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caminho especificado representa uma entrada válida no serviço de diretório; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o GUID do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When binding to an object in Active Directory Domain Services, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando se vincula a um objeto nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory, utilize o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>estrutura que representa o GUID do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Calls a method on the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Chama um método do objeto de serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: If the return value of the native method implements the IADs interface, a corresponding <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor devolvido do método nativo implementa a interface de IADs, um correspondente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>é devolvido.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a interface IADs, consulte o tópico [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) na biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: O nome do método a invocar.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> objects that contains the arguments of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Object>objetos que contém os argumentos do método a invocar.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido do método invocado.

trans-unit.source: The native method threw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception.
trans-unit.target: O método nativo emitiu um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>exceção.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>

trans-unit.source: The native method threw a <xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: O método nativo emitiu um <xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException>exceção.</xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property contains a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception that contains information about the actual error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>propriedade contém um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>exceção que contém informações sobre o erro real que ocorreu.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a property from the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma propriedade do objeto serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> property should be used to access the properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>propriedade deve ser utilizada para aceder às propriedades do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a obter.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the requested property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a propriedade pedida.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade do objeto de serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> property should be used to access the properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>propriedade deve ser utilizada para aceder às propriedades do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a definir.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory Domain Services object to set.
trans-unit.target: O objeto serviços de domínio do Active Directory para definir.

trans-unit.source: Moves this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object to the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Move este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>é `true`, chame o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>método no novo objeto para tornar a movimentação permanentes.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent to which you want to move this entry.
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal ao qual pretende mover esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> não é um contentor.

trans-unit.source: Moves this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object to the specified parent and changes its name to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Move este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto principal especificado e o respetivo nome é alterado para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>é `true`, chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>no novo objeto para tornar a movimentação permanentes.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent to which you want to move this entry.
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal ao qual pretende mover esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: The new name of this entry.
trans-unit.target: O novo nome desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> não é um contentor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the object as named with the underlying directory service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do objeto conforme com o nome com o serviço de diretório subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This name, along with <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, distinguishes this entry from its siblings and must be unique among its siblings in each container.
trans-unit.target: Este nome, along com <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, distingue esta entrada de respectivas e têm de ser exclusivos entre respectivas em cada contentor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the object as named with the underlying directory service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto conforme com o nome com o serviço de diretório subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>, as returned from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o GUID do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>, tal como devolvido do fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: Use the NativeGuid property when binding an object in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de NativeGuid quando se vincula um objeto no Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider returns the globally unique identifier of a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> in a different format than the Internet Information Services (IIS), Novell NetWare Directory Server (NDS), and WinNT providers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fornecedor o acesso protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) devolve o identificador exclusivo global de um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>num formato diferente que os serviços de informação Internet (IIS), servidor de diretório de NetWare do Novell (NDS) e fornecedores de WinNT.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>, as returned from the provider.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>estrutura que representa o GUID do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>, tal como devolvido pelo fornecedor de.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de Interfaces de serviço do Active Directory (ADSI) nativo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para converter o objeto serviços de domínio do Active Directory nativo, que implementa a interface de IADs, quando pretender utilizar uma interface COM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a interface IADs, consulte o tópico [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) na biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).

trans-unit.source: This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName> classes alone.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é para cenários avançados que não podem ser conseguidos com a <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>classes individualmente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizá-la, terá de importar uma das COM interfaces de família IADs, em seguida, converter esta propriedade para que a interface.

trans-unit.source: The native ADSI object.
trans-unit.target: O objecto ADSI nativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security descriptor for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o descritor de segurança para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object that represents the security descriptor for this directory entry.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objeto que representa o descritor de segurança para esta entrada de diretório.

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider-specific options for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as opções de específica do fornecedor para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration"></xref> object that contains the provider-specific options for this entry.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration"> </xref> objeto que contém as opções de específica do fornecedor para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets this entry's parent in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal desta entrada na hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the parent of this entry.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que representa o principal desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Define a palavra-passe para utilizar na autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and Password properties to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A>e propriedades de palavra-passe para especificar credenciais alternativas com a qual pretende aceder às informações nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>objetos obtida esta instância (por exemplo, através de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) são criados automaticamente com as mesmas credenciais alternativas.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe para utilizar na autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O caminho deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as propriedades de serviços de domínio do Active Directory para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the property is not initialized, Properties calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) method to retrieve the value from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade não foi inicializada, propriedades chama a interface ADSI [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) método para obter o valor da cache.

trans-unit.source: If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Se a cache de underling não terem sido carregada, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitamente chama [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).

trans-unit.source: This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Este método carrega os valores das propriedades suportados que não foram definidas na cache o repositório subjacente do diretório.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to Properties retrieves the property values in the cache only.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas subsequentes para propriedades obtém os valores de propriedade na cache apenas.

trans-unit.source: To control property cache loading, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar a cache de propriedade carregar, chame <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The Properties property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** propriedades a propriedade não é suportada para utilização com a extensão de cliente do Active Directory (DSClient) para [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém as propriedades que estão definidas nesta entrada.

trans-unit.source: Loads the property values for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto para a cache de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Loads the values of the specified properties into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os valores das propriedades especificadas para a cache de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An array of the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de propriedades especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Changes the name of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nome deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This will also affect the path that is used to refer to this entry.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Isto afetará também o caminho que é utilizado para fazer referência a esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, be sure to call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>é `true`, certifique-se chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>método no novo objeto para tornar a movimentação permanentes.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new name of the entry.
trans-unit.target: O novo nome da entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the schema class for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da classe de esquema para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This is the same as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este é o mesmo que o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's schema defines its properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>esquema do objeto define as respetivas propriedades e métodos.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The name of the schema class for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O nome da classe de esquema para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema object for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de esquema para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: An entry's schema determines a list of its mandatory and optional property names.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de uma entrada determina uma lista dos respetivos nomes de propriedade obrigatórios e opcionais.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to find out what properties and methods are available on the associated object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para saber quais as propriedades e métodos estão disponíveis no objeto associado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the schema class for this entry.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que representa a classe de esquema para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a cache deve ser consolidada após cada operação.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, são feitas alterações às propriedades localmente para uma cache e valores de propriedade para ser de leitura são colocadas em cache após o primeiro de leitura.

trans-unit.source: When the UsePropertyCache property is `true`, access to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's properties is faster.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de UsePropertyCache é `true`, acesso a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>Propriedades do objeto é mais rápido.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: Definir este como `false` fará com que a cache de ser consolidada após cada operação.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePropertyCache property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePropertyCache for `true` e pretende confirmar em cache as alterações, chame o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar os valores na cache depois de serem efetuadas alterações ao diretório, chame o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>antes de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para a cache de propriedade serão perdidas.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fornecedor o serviços de informação de Internet (IIS) não suporta a consolidar a cache após cada operação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cache não deve ser consolidada após cada operação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de utilizador para utilizar na autenticação de cliente.

trans-unit.source: You can set the Username and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> in order to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir o nome de utilizador e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A>para poder especificar credenciais alternativas com a qual pretende aceder às informações nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>objetos obtida esta instância (por exemplo, através de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) são criados automaticamente com as mesmas credenciais alternativas.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: O nome de utilizador a utilizar durante a autenticação de cliente.
